PROJECT(OSG_Thirdparty_Android)

#FILE(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${OSG_3RDPARTY_BUILD_DIR})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${OSG_3RDPARTY_SOURCE_DIR} ${OSG_3RDPARTY_BUILD_DIR})
